strapiPost.title: Creativity on the Street
strapiPost.content:
Downtown Springdale has a host of galleries, museums, makersâ€™ spaces and boutiques, and loves to show them off in style. 

  • A series: There will be a free Art Walk series taking place during 3 evenings over the next 2 months. Mark your calendar - the 3 dates are Oct. 7, Oct. 28, and Nov. 27. 
  • The whole deal: The Art Walk evenings will be filled with entertainment, food, drinks, and music to accompany the creative spaces on display. There are 12 participants that will be featured on the walks. 

For more information, click HERE.
